title: A Love To Kill
resume: A Love to Kill is a 2005 South Korean television drama series, starring Rain, Shin Min-a, Kim Sa-rang and Lee Ki-woo. It aired on KBS2 from October 31 to December 20, 2005 on Mondays and Tuesdays at 21:55 for 16 episodes.
